Module core.java.helper
Package com.pineframework.core.helper

Class ReflectionUtils

java.lang.Object
com.pineframework.core.helper.ReflectionUtils
public final class ReflectionUtils extends Object
The ReflectionUtils class provides utility functions to work with reflection mechanism.
  • getClassLoader()
  • scanPackage(String...)
  • scanPackageByAnnotation(Class, String)

    • scanPackage

      public static Set<Class<?>> scanPackage(String... packageNames)
      The scanPackage method returns all classes under the packages as a Set.
      Parameters:
      packageNames - packages should be scanned
      Returns:
      Set
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if packageNames is null or empty

    • scanPackageByAnnotation

      public static Set<Class<?>> scanPackageByAnnotation(Class<? extends Annotation> annotation, String... packageNames)
      The scanPackageByAnnotation method returns all decorated classes with a specific Annotation that put under a packages.
      Parameters:
      annotation - Annotation, to filter the classes
      packageNames - packages should be scanned
      Returns:
      Set
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null or empty

    • getField

      public static Optional<Field> getField(Class<?> type, String fieldName)
      The getField method is a recursive method to return the Optional of Field if the class is included the field, otherwise it returns Optional.empty().
      Parameters:
      type - class object of field owner
      fieldName - name of field
      Returns:
      Field
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null or empty

    • getFields

      public static List<Field> getFields(Class<?>... types)
      The getFields method returns level-one fields of a classes.
      Parameters:
      types - class object of fields owners
      Returns:
      List
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null

    • getDeepFields

      public static List<Field> getDeepFields(Class<?>... types)
      The getDeepFields method returns fields belong to the all classes.
      Parameters:
      types - class object of fields owners
      Returns:
      List
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if types is null

    • getFieldType

      public static Class<?> getFieldType(Class<?> owner, Field field)
      The getFieldType method returns the type of field as a class object.

      owner - class object of field owner
      field - Field
      Returns:
      Class, class object
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null or empty

      Parameters:
      type - class object of field owner
      annotation - Annotation, to use as a filter
      Returns:
      List
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null or empty

    • contain

      public static boolean contain(Class<?> type, String fieldName)
      The contain method returns true if the class is included the field otherwise, it returns false.
      Parameters:
      type - class object of field owner
      fieldName - name of field
      Returns:
      Boolean
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null or empty

    • extract

      public static Type extract(Class<?> owner, int index)
      The extract method returns type of generic class parameter in runtime.
      Parameters:
      owner - class object of field owner
      index - index number of class parameter
      Returns:
      Type
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null or empty

    • toJavaBasicType

      public static <T> T toJavaBasicType(Object value, Class<T> type)
      The toJavaBasicType method converts a value with unknown primitive type to a value with known primitive type.
      Type Parameters:
      T - expectation type
      Parameters:
      value - value with unknown type
      type - class object of expectation type
      Returns:
      wrapper of primitive value
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null
